verses.name: Deuteronomy 13:8
verses.text: Thou shalt not consent unto him, nor hearken unto him; neither shall thine eye pity him, neither shalt thou spare, neither shalt thou conceal him:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 13:9
verses.text: But thou shalt surely kill him; thine hand shall be first upon him to put him to death, and afterwards the hand of all the people.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 13:10
verses.text: And thou shalt stone him with stones, that he die; because he hath sought to thrust thee away from the Lord thy God, which brought thee out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage.
